question: Bhartrhari distinguishes between different types of sphota:
In Indian philosophy for analyses of language the following have been used:

Read the following statements related to Indian philosophy, (i) sabda or verbal testimony is recognized as a vital pramana, crucial for obtaining knowledge that is beyond the reach of perception and inference. (ii) Different schools provide distinct frameworks for understanding and validating sabda, reflecting their broader epistemological and metaphysical commitments.
Elements of Chandas are:
options: Meter, Syllabus, Foot- Line, Caesura, Rhyme
Meter, Syllable, Foot, Line, Caesura, Rhyme
Meteorite, Syllabus, Foot, Line, Caesura, Rhyme
answer: Meter, Syllable, Foot, Line, Caesura, Rhyme
